actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The rhinoceros makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 STR save or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the rhinoceros and knocked prone.
